# The `HotColdSplitting.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The goal of hot/cold splitting is to improve the memory locality of code. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The goal of hot/cold splitting is to improve the memory locality of code.

The splitting pass does this by identifying cold blocks and moving them into separate functions.

When the splitting pass finds a cold block (referred to as &quot;the sink&quot;), it grows a maximal cold region around that block. The maximal region contains all blocks (post-)dominated by the sink &#91;&#42;&#93;. In theory, these blocks are as cold as the sink. Once a region is found, it&#39;s split out of the original function provided it&#39;s profitable to do so.

&#91;&#42;&#93; In practice, there is some added complexity because some blocks are not safe to extract.

TODO: <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> the PM to get domtrees, and preserve BFI/BPI. TODO: Reorder outlined functions.

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Same as blockEndsInUnreachable in CodeGen/BranchFolding.cpp. Do not modify</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this function unless you modify the MBB version as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A no successor, non-return block probably ends in unreachable and is cold.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Also consider a block that ends in an indirect branch to be a return block,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// since many targets use plain indirect branches to return.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#a4683663d1041570f374ad7ac4ea119eb"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#a4683663d1041570f374ad7ac4ea119eb">blockEndsInUnreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a126a78caf2176eb39d879c899bdd749c">succ&#95;empty</a>(&amp;BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a266367eb01c634406b32f816d2d9c6bf">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = BB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ReturnInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;IndirectBrInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aa5755510005963e0d33f000914c5489d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aa5755510005963e0d33f000914c5489d">analyzeProfMetadata</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> ColdProbThresh,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Handle branches with &gt; 2 successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;CondBr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CondBr)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t TrueWt, FalseWt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(&#42;CondBr, TrueWt, FalseWt))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SumWt = TrueWt + FalseWt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SumWt == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrueProb = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(TrueWt, SumWt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FalseProb = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(FalseWt, SumWt);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumParams &gt; <a href="#a60a587bdd425f8af92ae933813303e9f">MaxParametersForSplit</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A pair of (basic block, score).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456" lineLink="#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b">BlockTy</a> = std::pair&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, unsigned&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A maximal outlining region. This contains all blocks post-dominated by a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sink block, the sink block itself, and all blocks dominated by the sink.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If sink-predecessors and sink-successors cannot be extracted in one region,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the static constructor returns a list of suitable extraction regions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">OutliningRegion &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A list of (block, score) pairs. A block&#39;s score is non-zero iff it&#39;s a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// viable sub-region entry point. Blocks with higher scores are better entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// points (i.e. they are more distant ancestors of the sink block).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BlockTy, 0&gt;</a> Blocks = &#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The suggested entry point into the region. If the region has multiple</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// entry points, all blocks within the region may not be reachable from this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// entry point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SuggestedEntryPoint = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Whether the entire function is cold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EntireFunctionCold = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If \\p BB is a viable entry point, return \\p Score. Return 0 otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getEntryPointScore(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Score) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(BB) ? Score : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// These scores should be lower than the score for predecessor blocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// because regions starting at predecessor blocks are typically larger.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScoreForSuccBlock = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScoreForSinkBlock = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">  OutliningRegion(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OutliningRegion &amp;) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">  OutliningRegion &amp;operator=(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OutliningRegion &amp;) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#afb4320cb58bc4cbe61cd1e3c8e7f73f3"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#afb4320cb58bc4cbe61cd1e3c8e7f73f3">OutliningRegion</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#a3f35d35f99dde67eaebf75393bee5275"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#a3f35d35f99dde67eaebf75393bee5275">OutliningRegion</a>(OutliningRegion &amp;&amp;) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#add67f7f4d83727202d564d298c9e13ac"><Highlight kind="normal">  OutliningRegion &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#add67f7f4d83727202d564d298c9e13ac">operator=</a>(OutliningRegion &amp;&amp;) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#aead9a4f05ccb13941f28611766176f30"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;OutliningRegion&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/outliningregion/#aead9a4f05ccb13941f28611766176f30">create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;SinkBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/postdominatortree">PostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;OutliningRegion&gt; Regions;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> RegionBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">    Regions.emplace&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">    OutliningRegion &#42;ColdRegion = &amp;Regions.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> addBlockToRegion = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Score) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">      RegionBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">      ColdRegion-&gt;Blocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(BB, Score);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The ancestor farthest-away from SinkBB, and also post-dominated by it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SinkScore = getEntryPointScore(SinkBB, ScoreForSinkBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">    ColdRegion-&gt;SuggestedEntryPoint = (SinkScore &gt; 0) ? &amp;SinkBB : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestScore = SinkScore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Visit SinkBB&#39;s ancestors using inverse DFS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredIt = ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abe62b2144b4f06c41efe3c775316f282">idf&#95;begin</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredEnd = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ea0b29d9cab61cc46291acf44187279">idf&#95;end</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredIt != PredEnd) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;PredBB = &#42;&#42;PredIt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SinkPostDom = PDT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/postdominatortree/#ac74ec035b8eeaeb39cfea312fa876c75">dominates</a>(&amp;SinkBB, &amp;PredBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the predecessor is cold and has no predecessors, the entire</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function must be cold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SinkPostDom &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad66c4759666aab78529658362b498c74">pred&#95;empty</a>(&amp;PredBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">        ColdRegion-&gt;EntireFunctionCold = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Regions;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If SinkBB does not post-dominate a predecessor, do not mark the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// predecessor (or any of its predecessors) cold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SinkPostDom || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(PredBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredIt.skipChildren();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep track of the post-dominated ancestor farthest away from the sink.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The path length is always &gt;= 2, ensuring that predecessor blocks are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// considered as entry points before the sink block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredScore = getEntryPointScore(PredBB, PredIt.getPathLength());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredScore &gt; BestScore) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">        ColdRegion-&gt;SuggestedEntryPoint = &amp;PredBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">        BestScore = PredScore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">      addBlockToRegion(&amp;PredBB, PredScore);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++PredIt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the sink can be added to the cold region, do so. It&#39;s considered as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an entry point before any sink-successor blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, split cold sink-successor blocks using a separate region.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This satisfies the requirement that all extraction blocks other than the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first have predecessors within the extraction region.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(SinkBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">      addBlockToRegion(&amp;SinkBB, SinkScore);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad66c4759666aab78529658362b498c74">pred&#95;empty</a>(&amp;SinkBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">        ColdRegion-&gt;EntireFunctionCold = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Regions;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">      Regions.emplace&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">      ColdRegion = &amp;Regions.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">      BestScore = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find all successors of SinkBB dominated by SinkBB using DFS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuccIt = ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3a4c46542f8881cacd05836ba00ab8ec">df&#95;begin</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuccEnd = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad6c4441c599522e0d10c1391a460c275">df&#95;end</a>(&amp;SinkBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccIt != SuccEnd) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;SuccBB = &#42;&#42;SuccIt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SinkDom = DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(&amp;SinkBB, &amp;SuccBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t allow the backwards &amp; forwards DFSes to mark the same block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DuplicateBlock = RegionBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(&amp;SuccBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If SinkBB does not dominate a successor, do not mark the successor (or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// any of its successors) cold.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DuplicateBlock || !SinkDom || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hotcoldsplitting-cpp-/#aef2714d7816ffbf7f4eebf159be19d1f">mayExtractBlock</a>(SuccBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccIt.skipChildren();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuccScore = getEntryPointScore(SuccBB, ScoreForSuccBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccScore &gt; BestScore) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">        ColdRegion-&gt;SuggestedEntryPoint = &amp;SuccBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">        BestScore = SuccScore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">      addBlockToRegion(&amp;SuccBB, SuccScore);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++SuccIt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Regions;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Whether this region has nothing to extract.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RegionStartIt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ec2517b6489e71067be03afebb4d350">remove&#95;if</a>(Blocks, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b">BlockTy</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Score = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
